data.message: Hi I'm using my husbands account because I cant log in in mine I get a security check box saying that my account is not eligible for the process I need help I don't know what to do.. Can someone help me My account is under Laura Elena Lopez..

replies.message: Your profile was deactivated it doesn't come up anymore. The same thing happened to.me with the other profile. You have to.make a new one
Hi Laura. If you're having trouble logging in to your account due to security checks, please let us know here: http://bit.ly/2gsQNlG. -Kiara

Facebook  so how can I get back into my old account? For some reason Facebook locked me out of my account and I was never able to get back in. After multiple tries it asked me for my ID, Address City, State and Street I lived on that seemed very odd to me so I never messed with it anymore. I still remember my email and password
